mapper.select: SELECT h.tag, COUNT(DISTINCT bl.board_id) as likeCount FROM board_like bl JOIN board b ON bl.board_id = b.id JOIN board_hashtag bh ON b.id = bh.board_id JOIN hashtag h ON bh.tag_id = h.id WHERE bl.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY h.tag ORDER BY likeCount DESC

SELECT DISTINCT b.*, u.nickname, COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) as commentCount, COUNT(DISTINCT bl2.id) as likeCount, h.tag as tagName, (SELECT file_name FROM board_image WHERE board_id = b.id LIMIT 1) as thumbnailImage FROM board_like bl JOIN board b ON bl.board_id = b.id JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id JOIN board_hashtag bh ON b.id = bh.board_id JOIN hashtag h ON bh.tag_id = h.id LEFT JOIN comment c ON b.id = c.board_id LEFT JOIN board_like bl2 ON b.id = bl2.board_id WHERE bl.user_id = #{userId} AND h.tag = #{tag} GROUP BY b.id, b.content, b.created_at, u.nickname, h.tag ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
SELECT file_name FROM board_image WHERE board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY id ASC
